import React, {useEffect} from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const ScoreList = () => { const arr = [ {'day': '월', 'score': Math.floor(Math.random() * 6)}, {'day': '화', 'score':Math.floor(Math.random() * 6)}, {'day': '수', 'score':Math.floor(Math.random() * 6)}, {'day': '목', 'score':Math.floor(Math.random() * 6)}, {'day': '금', 'score':Math.floor(Math.random() * 6)}, {'day': '토', 'score':Math.floor(Math.random() * 6)}, {'day': '일', 'score':Math.floor(Math.random() * 6)}] return ( <> {arr.map((value, index) => { return (

{value['day']}

<> { (value['score'] === 1)?
: (value['score'] === 2)?
: (value['score'] === 3)?
: (value['score'] === 4)?
: (value['score'] === 5)?
:
} `${location.pathname}?sort=name`} />
) })} ) } export default ScoreList;
